choices.text:
in python make a plot that compares two columns in a dataframe.
To create a plot that compares two columns in a Pandas dataframe, follow these steps:
1. Import the necessary libraries for creating plots with Matplotlib and Seab HL.
2. Load your dataset into a new column using the "Add New Column" option under the column information menu.
3. Once you've added a new column, go to Edit > Prepare New Column.
4. Click on the specific category of articles in order to read them.
5. After reading articles, click on the specific category of videos in order to watch them.
6. Finally, after watching videos, click on the specific category of audios in order to listen to them.
7. To further customize your plot, add a title and an author credit line using the "Rename Line" option under the column information menu.
8. Click on the specific category of links in order to follow them.
9. Finally, after clicking links, click on the specific category of bookmarks in order to mark them.
10. To add a caption and an author credit line using the "Add Caption" option under the column information menu.
Remember that creating a plot involves more than just adding new columns. You also need to rename lines, prepare new columns, edit existing ones, and click on specific categories of links or bookmarks in order to mark them. And finally, add captions and author credits using the "Add Caption" option under the column information menu.
